name: Lovescapes
description:
Oh no! After a whirlwind romance leads to heartbreak, Ella is exhausted…and it’s beginning to show!

Clean her up by choosing beautiful new clothes, hairstyles, makeup, and accessories to help strengthen her love game. It’s time to move on to the NEXT true love and gain back the confidence she once had. Solve colorful match-3 puzzles to help Ella glow up like never before!

True beauty lies within the heart, but in today’s reality—not everyone sees it.
Sometimes, a new hairstyle or cute outfit is all that’s needed to get a foot in the door. Why not take this chance to prove and share that you’re beautiful inside and out! Makeover to catch their eyes and make them fall head over heels in love with the REAL you!

Help Ella and her friends navigate the ups and downs to a life full of romantic love, forever friendships, and dramatic betrayals in this fantastic match-3 puzzles and love story game!

Well, what are you waiting for? Let’s get pamperin’!

Game features:

LOVE story adventures with interactive choices, fashion, and puzzles!
OVER 20+ addicting juicy chapters—and still growing!
VIP tools and items available to achieve that perfect look!
EXCITING and diverse character development for guys, gals, and everyone in between!
SOLVE hundreds to thousands of colorful match-3 puzzles for hours of fun!
CHOOSE outfit from head-to-toe for a full project makeover!
ARTWORK of characters and scenes you can’t help but love and adore!
PLAY daily for extra bonus perks and rewards!
EVERY fashionista and hopeless romantic’s dream game!
